title: Given any tax year 2024-25 and after

submittedOn.description: An ISO-8601 compliant date-time representing when pension charges were submitted.

pensionSchemeOverseasTransfers.description: Object holding the transfer of overseas pension to another pension scheme.

providerName.description: The name of the pension provider

providerAddress.description: The address of the pension provider.
providerAddress.example: 111 Main Street, Any Town, Any City

providerCountryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must be a ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code.

items.description: A list of one or more qualifying overseas pension scheme reference numbers for overseas pensions contributions.

A list of one or more unique references provided by HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) when the scheme has been registered for tax relief and exemptions. It is 10 characters made up of 8 numbers followed by 2 letters.

transferCharge.description: The amount the pension provider charges to transfer the pension. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

transferChargeTaxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on the transfer charge. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionSchemeUnauthorisedPayments.description: Object holding tax on unauthorised payment.

items.description: A list of one or more unique references provided by HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) when the scheme has been registered for tax relief and exemptions. It is 10 characters made up of 8 numbers followed by 2 letters.

amount.description: The amount of the unauthorised payment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxPaid.description: The amount of foreign tax paid in pounds sterling. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

noSurcharge.description: Object holding unauthorised payments for no surcharge.

amount.description: The amount of the unauthorised payment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxPaid.description: The amount of foreign tax paid in pounds sterling. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionContributions.description: Object holding payments paid into a pension

items.description: A list of one or more unique references provided by HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) when the scheme has been registered for tax relief and exemptions. It is 10 characters made up of 8 numbers followed by 2 letters.

inExcessOfTheAnnualAllowance.description: The amount of the in excess of the annual allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

annualAllowanceTaxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on annual allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

isAnnualAllowanceReduced.description: A boolean indicating whether annual allowance has been reduced. The value must be true or false. If isAnnualAllowanceReduced is true then either taperedAnnualAllowance or moneyPurchasedAllowance must be true as well.

taperedAnnualAllowance.description: A boolean indicating whether tapered annual allowance is lower than the standard annual allowance. The value must be true or false.

moneyPurchasedAllowance.description: A boolean indicating whether the person has paid the maximum amount allowed for their reduced allowance, based on Money Purchase Annual Allowance (MPAA). The value must be true or false. For example: false

overseasPensionContributions.description: Object holding the contributions paid into overseas pension.

providerName.description: The name of the pension provider

providerAddress.description: The address of the pension provider.
providerAddress.example: 111 Main Street, Any Town, Any City

providerCountryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must be a ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code.

items.description: A list of one or more qualifying overseas pension scheme reference numbers for overseas pensions contributions.

A list of one or more unique references provided by HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) when the scheme has been registered for tax relief and exemptions. It is 10 characters made up of 8 numbers followed by 2 letters.

shortServiceRefund.description: The amount of short service refund for overseas pension contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

shortServiceRefundTaxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on short service refund. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
